org.apache.ignite.plugin.security

Interface GridSecuritySubject

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable

    public interface GridSecuritySubject
extends Serializable
    Security subject representing authenticated node or client with a set of permissions.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      InetSocketAddress address()
      Gets subject connection address.
      UUID id()
      Gets subject ID.
      Object login()
      Login provided via subject security credentials.
      GridSecurityPermissionSet permissions()
      Authorized permission set for the subject.
      GridSecuritySubjectType type()
      Gets subject type, either node or client.

    • Method Detail

      • id

        UUID id()
        Gets subject ID.
        Returns:
        Subject ID.

      • type

        GridSecuritySubjectType type()
        Gets subject type, either node or client.
        Returns:
        Subject type.

      • login

        Object login()
        Login provided via subject security credentials.
        Returns:
        Login object.

      • address

        InetSocketAddress address()
        Gets subject connection address. Usually InetSocketAddress representing connection IP and port.
        Returns:
        Subject connection address.

      • permissions

        GridSecurityPermissionSet permissions()
        Authorized permission set for the subject.
        Returns:
        Authorized permission set for the subject.
